data.title: Power Stop Brakes on a souped up Ford Raptor - Truck U Episode 917 - (segment)
data.tags: Power Stop Brake Kit, Powerstop, performance brake kit, Z36 Extreme Truck & Tow Brake Kit, Ford Raptor, performance brakes
data.description: How can you jump a Ford Raptor even further? Put a supercharger in it. Matt and Bruno team up with Roush Performance to get the maximum power output of a stock Raptor. With all of that power, stock brake pads and rotors just won't cut it. That's why, in this segment, The guys at Truck U put on a Z36 Extreme Performance Truck and Tow brake kit from Power Stop. This souped up Ford Raptor won't just stop, it will Power Stop!

data.title: Power Stop Evolution Tru Cast Performance Drilled and Slotted Rotors
data.tags: Power Stop Brakes, Powerstop, Performance Brake Kit, drilled & slotted rotors, brake rotors
data.description: Power Stop drilled and slotted rotors give you the advantages of both drilled holes for cooling and slots to sweep away gas and dust. Power Stop rotors use only the finest blanks and feature G3000 grade castings from the best foundries. All drilled and slotted rotors (except for hub rotor assemblies) are silver zinc plated to resist rust. With a direct OE fit, there are no special modifications needed on your car, truck or SUV. The drilled and slotted design is our most popular performance rotor for street and track day applications.

asset.title: Power Stop Evolution Tru Cast Performance Drilled and Slotted Rotors

All drilled and slotted rotors (except for hub rotor assemblies) are silver zinc plated to resist rust. With a direct OE fit, there are no special modifications needed on your car, truck or SUV. The drilled and slotted design is our most popular performance rotor for street and day track applications.

data.title: PowerStop Performance Brakes for Trucks and Towing Vehicles
data.tags: Power Stop Brakes, Powerstop, Performance brake kits, truck brakes, brakes for towing
data.description: Power Stop 1-Click Extreme Truck & Tow Brake Kits offer superior stopping power that is demanded by those that Tow/Haul, as well as the off-road enthusiast. Any time you add weight to a vehicle by hauling a load, towing a trailer, or simply adding a larger wheel/tire combination, you change the operating conditions of your stock brake package. Those operating conditions may exceed the ability of the stock braking components. Power Stop Z36 Truck & Tow Brake Kits are specifically matched components designed to produce the brake torque that is needed due to the increase in wheel diameter or load. The Drilled & Slotted rotors will reduce the heat and the Z36 Extreme Truck & Tow brake pads will provide the extra stopping power to bring your hauler to a halt quickly.

data.title: PowerStop Evolution Plus Ceramic Brake Pads
data.tags: Power Stop Brakes, Powerstop, Ceramic Brake Pads, performance brakes, Evolution Plus Ceramic Brake Pads
data.description: Power Stop Z17 Evolution Plus product line combines our performance proven Evolution Ceramic pads with application specific brake hardware kits.
